name: TechJargonoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Did you ever wonder how to keep up with the pace of ever growing buzzwords of the tech world? With this skill, you will know enough to be dangerous!

Tech Jargon of the day covers jargon from following topics:
- Application Frameworks
- Programming Languages
- DevOps Frameworks
- Hosting Technologies
- Cloud Technologies
- Container Technologies
- and more!

For questions or comments, please contact me @ 
o https://www.linkedin.com/in/ajuluri
o https://twitter.com/ajuluri
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
